author: Charles Davis
title: Senate Democrats call on Trump to work with them to combat anti-Asian bigotry
description:
• A majority of the Senate Democratic coalition, including Sens. Bernie Sanders and Chuck Schumer, signed on to a letter pledging to work with President Donald Trump to combat the rise in anti-Asian bias.
  • Manjusha Kulkarni, executive director …
content: Over two dozen Senate Democrats have signed a letter to US President Donald Trump concerning the rise in harassment and hate crimes against people of Asian descent amid the COVID-19 pandemic, pledging to work with him "to confront the racism that so many enco… [+2136 chars]
